_source.text: A better phrasing might be: This is because the query selects titles from the books table regardless of whether or not they match editions having ISBN numbers.

text: A **better** phrasing **might** be: This is **because** the query selects titles from the books table
regardless of whether or not they match editions having **ISBN** **numbers**.

_source.text: @ Adam Collyer - more likely because most politicians have better manners than most TV journalists (what would I like to say to that self-important Paxman?!) and only make telling replies when sufficiently annoyed/insulted (as in "Mr Churchill - you're drunk, horribly drunk").

text: @ Adam Collyer - more likely **because** most politicians have **better** manners than most TV **journalists**
(what would I like to say to that self-important Paxman?!) and **only** **make** telling replies when
